item.title: bitcoind and onion listening
item.description:
bitcoind and onion listening

I would like to get Bitcoind to advertise that it is listening on an onion address. However, I do not want to have Bitcoind use a tor socks proxy to connect. I have a special router for tor conne...

item.title: Ethereum Hard Fork to prevent another DAO collapse | HolyTransaction
item.description:
Ethereum Hard Fork to prevent another DAO collapse | HolyTransaction

Today Ethereum founder Vitalik Buterin released a new statement explaining that Ethereum Foundation will support the Ethereum hard fork, or the blockchain version that includes the hard fork. The project's goal is to allow investors to recover funds lost in the DAO collapse.

item.title: Financial Stability Board Weighing Digital Currency Risks - CoinDesk
item.description:
Financial Stability Board Weighing Digital Currency Risks - CoinDesk

The Financial Stability Board (FSB), an international body composed of central bank officials and finance regulators, said in its latest annual report that it continues to assess opportunities and risks related to digital currencies. The report, published earlier this week, indicated that the FSB's work is largely in line with previous statements from the organization.

item.title: Bitcoin Impact Debated Ahead of Possible Bank of Japan Stimulus - CoinDesk
item.description:
Bitcoin Impact Debated Ahead of Possible Bank of Japan Stimulus - CoinDesk

The price of bitcoin has benefitted from macroeconomic uncertainty this year, rising more than 50% over the last six months as China devalued the yuan and the UK dramatically exited the European Union. As the calendar rolls ahead to August, and excitement over these price drivers fades, market observers are beginning to wonder if further global events will benefit the digital currency's markets in 2016.

item.title: Florida Court: Bitcoin is Not Money (Yet) | Investopedia
item.description:
Florida Court: Bitcoin is Not Money (Yet) | Investopedia

In the first ruling of its kind to date, a Miami, Florida judge has dismissed a money laundering case involving the purchase of $1,500 worth of stolen credit card numbers using bitcoin.

item.title: Hard Fork Proposal: My marriage contract was written to the blockchain.. Shes a total bitch and I want out. * /r/Bitcoin
item.description:

item.title: Blockstream Acquires GreenAddress, Bitcoin Wallet Software Provider
item.description:
Blockstream Acquires GreenAddress, Bitcoin Wallet Software Provider

Addition of Multi-Platform Wallet and Strong Development Team Strengthens Blockstream's Sidechain Platform We're pleased to announce that we've acquired GreenAddress, a leading bitcoin wallet software provider based in Europe. GreenAddress has a demonstrated track record of delivering an industry-leading product that prioritizes security, privacy and convenience.

item.title: A Painful Lesson For The Ethereum Community
item.description:
A Painful Lesson For The Ethereum Community

After a torrid few weeks arguing about what to do, while the DAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organization) became ever more corrupted due to repeated attempts to recover the money without fixing the code problem that made it impossible to prevent the money being stolen again, the Ethereum community has finally bowed [...]

item.title: Bitcoin investment vehicles
item.description:
Bitcoin investment vehicles

Regulated investment vehicles allows regulated investors, like banks and pension funds, to invest to the underlying assets. All terms, fees, transaction clearing times and such are upfront available in BitcoinETI prospectus. Fees generally go towards the asset management processes to ensure integrity and trust of the investment vehicle and prevent Mt.

item.title: Loyyal Creates Blockchain-Style 'Internet of Loyalty' in Dubai
item.description:
Loyyal Creates Blockchain-Style 'Internet of Loyalty' in Dubai

Dubai is set to host the world's first blockchain loyalty program with the launch of Loyyal, an umbrella scheme aimed at uniting many rewards programs under one banner. Also read: BitOasis Funding Boosts Blockchain Prospects in the Middle East In concert with the Dubai national government, Loyyal will use an "unbundled" blockchain to provide value transfer between loyalty scheme participants.
